name: Garbage Truck Wash Salon: Cleanup Messy Trucks After Waste Collection
name_original: Garbage Truck Wash Salon: Cleanup Messy Trucks After Waste Collection
description:
Garbage trucks roam in alls streets of city, pick up the garbage and keep your city clean. But in cleaning the city streets they get themselves dirty. Clean them, clean all the dirt, mud and garbage left with them. so they can go back to work.
This game is designed as your Washing Workshop specially for garbage trucks. so Keep the good work going.

How Train Engine Wash Works
-> Use Water to remove mud
-> Use soap to remove stains
-> Use Sponge to clean the dirt
-> Dry the train engine using blower
-> Apply Polish to shine
